Name: TA 1291 Global filters edit page UI tests

Tests.Name: Test 1: Create a global filter from the list page

Steps.Name: Step: Create a global filter 'gf'
Step: Create a global filter 'gf1'
Step: User can delete global filter 'gf1'
Step: Create a global filter 'gf-source1'
Step: Update source of the global filter 'gf_source1'
Step: update IP`s of global filter 'gf_source1'
Step: User can delete global filter 'gf-source1'
Step: User cannot delete global filter 'API Discovery'
Step: Create a global filter 'gf2'
Step: User can add entries to the section global filter 'gf2'
Step: User can change name of global filter 'gf2'
Step: Create a global filter 'gf_source2'
Step: Update source of the global filter 'gf_source2'
Step: User cannot add entries to the section of the global filter 'gf_source2'
Step: User can change name of global filter 'gf_source2'
Step: User cannot add entries to the section global filter 'Deny Tor'
Step: User cannot change source global filter 'Facebook Crawlers'
Step: User cannot change name of global filter 'Googlebots'

Tests.Name: Test 4: Global filter`s name field validations

Steps.Name: Step: User can create a global filter with text name
Step: User cannot create a global filter with empty name

Expected.Text:
b"schema mismatched: 
'' is too short

Failed validating 'minLength' in schema['properties']['name']:
    {'description': 'Name of entity shown in UI',
     'minLength': 1,
     'title': 'Name',
     'type': 'string'}

On instance['name']:
    ''"

Steps.Name: Step: User cannot create a global filter with the same name

Expected.Text: b'409 Conflict: entry with name textname already exists in document [globalfilters]'

Steps.Name: Step: User can create a global filter with long name
Step: User can create a global filter with special chars name
Step: User cannot create a global filter with space char name

Expected.Text:
b"schema mismatched: 
' ' is too short

Failed validating 'minLength' in schema['properties']['name']:
    {'description': 'Name of entity shown in UI',
     'minLength': 1,
     'title': 'Name',
     'type': 'string'}

On instance['name']:
    ''"

Expected.Text:
b"schema mismatched: 
[['path', '/test', ''], ['path', '/test', '']] has non-unique elements

Failed validating 'uniqueItems' in schema[1]['properties']['entries']:
    {'items': {'$ref': '#/definitions/rule'},
     'type': 'array',
     'uniqueItems': True}

On instance['entries']:
    [['path', '/test', ''], ['path', '/test', '']]"
